long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"The 'Search Tool' extension makes searching simple. It lets you search selected words easily, pick how results show up, and group websites by category to search more effectively."
*The 'Search Tool' extension simplifies searching with ease.
*It offers four window types for customizing your search experience.
*You can open multiple search windows at once.
*It allows you to easily group websites by category to streamline your searches.
